Reviews.Title: my huskies love it
Reviews.Author: Ryan C. Morris
Reviews.Content: we needed a third bed for our siberian huskies and they immediately hopped on this bed when i put it out for them.  they take turns using it but they seem to really like the bed and it seems to always be in use by one of our babies.  it was a good deal and i am happy with the bed!

Reviews.Title: DOG HEAVEN
Reviews.Author: Bushwhacker
Reviews.Content: SEEMS TO BE WELL MADE,I BOUGHT IT FOR MY BLIND BOSTON TERRIER,HE WENT TO IT FIRST THING AND HAS BEEN SLEEPING ON IT EVER SINCE!

Reviews.Title: No complaints from Maggie!
Reviews.Author: nina
Reviews.Content: Took it out of the package, my lab got on it and sleeps on it every night. It is smaller than she needs, but she has no complaints!

Reviews.Title: Not for chewing dogs!
Reviews.Author: Anita R. West
Reviews.Content: The filler is not particularly strong. The nylon zipper with plastic tab was extremely tasty, according to our dog. She had eaten through the covering after two days.

Reviews.Title: perfect for my lab
Reviews.Author: Paula R. Paniccia
Reviews.Content: my 15 year old lab loves the bed which makes me happy, it is not to heavy and not to light for her to sleep on or get up.

Reviews.Title: Best pet bed I've ever owned
Reviews.Author: Margaret L Mooney
Reviews.Content: This pet bed came a lot faster than I thought it would given its size. The top of it is soft and the bottom of it is waterproof and doesn't leave fuzzy pieces all over my living room. My dog absolutely adores it.

Reviews.Title: Maybe not as good for small dogs?
Reviews.Author: Casey J. Beavers "Casey"
Reviews.Content: I thought it would be ok even though it is designed for larger dogs, but my small dogs have not taken to it at all.  It has been three weeks, and they will both get on it for about one minute every few days before deciding they don't like it.In the bed's defense, my dogs are very old and may not really like new things, but I did find it a bit lumpy.I like that it has a washable outer cover.  I think most dogs would value it, but mine did not...yet.i would say for bigger dogs--30 to 60 lbs, they would probably be fine with it.

Reviews.Title: Not very thick
Reviews.Author: Dennis Knight
Reviews.Content: I have 2 dogs (25 pounds and 40 pounds) and these are not what I was expecting. Once you get the package and realize this pillow is folded into quarters (folded in half, then folded in half the other direction) you know it is not very full/thick. It really is filled like a cheap bedroom pillow.The material seems strong and durable. I guess you get what you pay for here. I would not buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: Love the look, but the zipper broke
Reviews.Author: Atkinsok
Reviews.Content: Loved the look initially, but the zipper broke very quickly.  Now the pad shows and it looks less than desirable.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality. good price
Reviews.Author: james Bradberry
Reviews.Content: It was a pretty good product.  Not as thick as I would have liked.  But its doing the job as and seem to be holding up to a 140 American Bulldog

Reviews.Title: Not a repeat
Reviews.Author: Jolie
Reviews.Content: Its ok but not a very high quality bed. Smaller and less stuffed than I thought. Not a good bed.

Reviews.Title: pup loves it
Reviews.Author: tkam14
Reviews.Content: got this for my lab/spaniel mix, and he loves it. often prefers it to my bed (which was the point) great investment, can't beat the price

Reviews.Title: great bed
Reviews.Author: Shauna Carleton
Reviews.Content: bed is made well great price was just what my family  was looking for, made of good quality material pet friendly

Reviews.Title: Versatile dog bed.
Reviews.Author: Michael L Rasper
Reviews.Content: This is the dog bed I was looking for. It can be used anywhere. It's portable, flexible, durable and washable and my Australian shepherd seems to enjoy it. It was also very reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: Tough and fine bed
Reviews.Author: Ellen Taylor
Reviews.Content: This bed has been thoroughly tested by my ruthless Italian greyhound, Allie Oop.It is washed almost daily. I love this bed. Excellent product for the money.

ProductInfo.Features:
Recommended for pets up to 70lbs
Water resistant treatment on bottom
Machine Washable
Comfortable; durable green fabric with Mossy Oak accents
Most popular camouflage pattern
ProductInfo.Name: Mossy Oak 27 by 36-Inch Pillow Pet Bed, Large
